entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
